\TR[ref=#1]{\psframebox[linestyle=none,framesep=2pt]{%
\begin{varwidth}{15ex}\center #2\end{varwidth}}}}
\newcommand{\LFTr}[2]{\TR[ref=#1]{\psframebox[linestyle=none,framesep=2pt]{#2}}}

\fontspec{Amiri}[Scale=0.9,Script=Arabic]
\RL{#1}}

\fontspec{Amiri}[Scale=0.7,Script=Arabic]
